Pre-Game Insights: India, who are yet to lose a match at the ongoing T20 World Cup 2024, will be the favourites to get the better of Afghanistan despite a neck-and-neck battle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Kensington Oval in the T20 World Cup 2024 has provided assistance to the fast bowlers and spinners alike, and has given some assistance to the batters also.
Others: Afghanistan have drubbed the likes of Uganda, New Zealand, and Papua New Guinea in their first three wins at the T20 World Cup 2024, with their batters and bowlers stepping up as a collective unit.
